# Notes

## Trying to get auth working

```bash
curl -X POST \
  https://anypoint.mulesoft.com/mocking/api/v1/sources/exchange/assets/0ad8e50c-1a63-485d-bb65-14c4b24db6f3/authentication-experience-api-oas/1.0.34/m/oauth2/registration \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -H 'client_id: https://testclientapp.ato.gov.au/jwtbearer' \
  -H 'client_secret: YOUR_FAKE_CLIENT_SECRET' \
  -d '{
    "client_name": "LACIMA121",
    "client_uri": "https://svt-iam.health.gov.au/enduser",
    "jwt": "'"${JWT_TOKEN}"'",
    "redirect_uris": [
      "https://svt-iam.health.gov.au/platform"
    ],
    "software_id": "SW-000003",
    "software_version_id": "06d24b54-cbf8-4fe4-b7c1-c959aa6c3256",
    "x_509": "'"${X509_CERT}"'"
  }'
  ```


```bash
curl -X POST \
   https://api-svt.health.gov.au/authentication/exp/v1/oauth2/registration  \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -H 'client_id: c64484a9-6cb3-4ad0-b9bd-5563567175de' \
  -H 'client_secret: xxxxxxxxxxxxxx' \
  -d '{
    "client_name": "JosieJenkins",
    "client_uri": "https://svt-iam.health.gov.au/enduser",
    "jwt": "'"${JWT_TOKEN}"'",
    "redirect_uris": [
      "https://svt-iam.health.gov.au/platform"
    ],
    "software_id": "SW-000003",
    "software_version_id": "43431d63-e316-453b-b4b6-18da7b71a66c",
    "x_509": "'"${X509_CERT}"'"
  }'
  ```

## working locally on go server
- building mule app against this one

```bash
curl -X POST \
   http://localhost:8080/api/oauth2/registration  \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -H 'client_id: c64484a9-6cb3-4ad0-b9bd-5563567175de' \
  -H 'client_secret: xxxxxxxxxxxxxx' \
  -d '{
    "client_name": "JosieJenkins",
    "client_uri": "https://svt-iam.health.gov.au/enduser",
    "jwt": "'"${JWT_TOKEN}"'",
    "redirect_uris": [
      "https://svt-iam.health.gov.au/platform"
    ],
    "software_id": "SW-000003",
    "software_version_id": "43431d63-e316-453b-b4b6-18da7b71a66c",
    "x_509": "'"${X509_CERT}"'"
  }'
  ```

JosieJenkins public cert
export X509_CERT="-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE----------END CERTIFICATE-----"
